mn81:6.16: sottisināniṃ → sottiṃ sināniṃ (bj, pts1) | sottisinānaṃ (s1-3, km, mr)
mn81:8.13: vinivaṭṭetvā → viniveṭhetvā (bj, s2, s3, km, pts1) | vinivedhetvā (s1)
mn81:8.16: sīsaṃnhātaṃ → sasīsaṃ nahātaṃ (bj) | sīsanhātaṃ (s1-3, km) | sīsanahātaṃ (pts1)
mn81:14.2: bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhadraṃ → bhadraṃ bhadraṃ (mr)
mn81:18.5: ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa → ghaṭikāre kumbhakāre (bj, s2, s3, km) | ghaṭīkāre kumbhakāre (s1, pts1)
mn81:18.12: kumbhakāro pannamusalo na sahatthā pathaviṃ khaṇati → kumbhakāro na musalena na sahatthā paṭhaviñca khanati (s1-3, km) | kumbhakāro na musalena na sahatthā paṭhaviṃ khaṇati (pts1) | kumbhakāro na musalena sahatthā pathaviñca khaṇati (mr)
mn81:18.13: mūsikukkaro → mūsikukkāro (bj) | mūsikukkuro (si, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn81:19.12: na vijahati → na vijahi (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn81:21.20: na devotivassi → na cātivassi (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
